select empno,ename,deptno,position,phone from tbl_emp
where ename like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where empno like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where deptno like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where position like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where phone like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
